name: Stick war escape
description:
You have to play for the Viking, who was captured by the Knights. For many years the knights have been at war with the Vikings, and only to you the chosen Viking is destined to escape from captivity and finish this war.
A lot of options for escaping from captivity. Various weapons for battle with enemies.
A lot of dangers come to you on the way. Be attentive and quick reaction to successfully escape from captivity and destroy enemies.
Simple graphics with animation will give you a relaxed moment of time.
In the game, you can sometimes use a horse to escape.
If you like games in the style of Stickman escape and battles, then be sure to download this game.
All around you will see different, and even field battles. An epic game with black humor awaits you!
